website_summaries.verdict: The cult classic in terms of durability and effective water cooling.
pros: One of the more versatile as well as cost effective coolers available
Easily stay hydrated at the gym or on the job
Wide-mouth top and twist-on cap make it easy to fill
Reports suggest it keeps water cold for up to 12 hours

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for the holidays & reunions, they showed up the day I needed them so I couldn't return them. They do not pour right and one actually had to be pushed back into place on the handle. I bought them to use to replace tea jugs with leaking spigots,,, I empty the good one and refill from the junk one to make them work for me
customer_reviews.author: norma t miller

customer_reviews.title: cant find anything better
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work daily ... i work lawn care. i buy a new one at the beginning of every year cause they get beat up ... would purchase a different brand if there was a different brand for a 1 gallon jug .. but can never find a different one so am stuck with this ... isn't bad but per se, just hard to clean the nozzle after a while it gets gross and leaks occasionally, the lid has to be on just right.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great multi purpose cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My husband takes homemade tea to work and this is excellent for being leak -proof and easy to carry. We save a bundle over buying pre-made tea, too. My travel water bottles clip onto the handle so it's easy to have a bottle to refill from the cooler. This is very simple to clean since the whole top comes off. His only complaint is that the beverage comes out slowly, but that's not all bad if you are filling a cup from this cooler. I would definitely recommend this and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bexter

customer_reviews.title: Good jug fair price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jug! The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because mine will leak from the crack of the pouring spout even while shut tight if it falls on it's side in my car or wherever.... I had to try to dry up about half a gallon of water from my car one day. Lol. But I am still pleased with it, as it functions perfectly as long as it's not dropped on its side... And I only paid 9 dollars for it, so I can't complain! It doesn't leak all over the place when pouring into cups.. Or directly into my mouth. ;) So It's a great jug in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye got water!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we wanted! I've been looking for a water jug for my husband to take with him to work that would hold enough water with ice and keep cold all day. My husband is an installation technician, and he has to leave his water jug in his work van all day. In during the winter, it's not a problem, but during the summer? Not so much. I researched a lot before making my purchase. I not only wanted something to keep his water cool, but I also worried about BPA and other harmful chemicals. This does exactly what it promises, and we are incredibly happy with our purchase. I would definitely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gym
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for me at the gym. Holds a little over 1 gallon. I did find a better price at Walmart for a dollar less. I also find the spout a little diffecult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Howard

customer_reviews.title: Works well and doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.text: I love my 1 gallon water cooler. I use this to mix up some sports drink and ice when working in the field. I was skeptical at first as there is no rubber gasket for the lid, but it does not seem to leak at all. The venting works well and it keeps ice for an entire work day in the Tennessee heat when filled halfway with ice.
customer_reviews.author: TNCave

customer_reviews.title: Great little cooler bottle! keeps drinks cold for hours. No leaking or spillage from this cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Great little cooler bottle! keeps drinks cold for hours. I purchased this Coleman 1 gallon jug for the days when I leave my house at 7am for a day of bike races and dont return for hours. This allows me to easily carry a gallon of water or sports drink and fill bottles with the convenient pour spout in the lid. The container does a great job keeping drinks cold, especially when I freeze some of the drink in it overnight. No leaking or spillage from this cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Leaky and over-priced
customer_reviews.text: I took this 1 gallon jug to work daily for my water intake. It leaked constantly no matter how tightly I screwed on the cap. Ended up having several liters of water leaked on to my car floor over a succession of weeks. Would get to work with 1/2 the water spilled out and would have to go buy water at the store anyway. I threw it out and bought an off-brand one from Walmart for $2 less which doesn't leak at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Pope

customer_reviews.title: Better design than blue Rubbermaid version
customer_reviews.text: I had the blue Rubbermaid one provided by my company until the lid broke and decided to try this one and I am glad I did its like someone at Coleman tried the Rubbermaid version and improved all the flaws no leaking yet and keeps water cool still pretty new so I'll see how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: mr.anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Keeps drinks cold all day.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hot repair shop 10+ hrs/day 6 days/week and I used to use the 1/2 gal jugs but would end up draining them before closing. Purchased this about 4 months ago and I've used it every work day since. It's fantastic! Keeps the water/ice cold in 90+ heat all day and it doesn't leak a drop. I recently had the misfortune of catching the lid beneath my commercial mower deck and while it dented the top a little, it's still leak free! I wouldn't hesitate to buy another. It can be a little cumbersome to drink from when it's full, but what do you expect? It's a gallon jug!
customer_reviews.author: Garan Wallick

customer_reviews.title: Recommended purchase! Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable price! It's bigger than what I thought it would be and the only downside is it doesn't have a spigot to access water. You have to lift it and pour! I bought this item for my daughter who works in distribution warehouse. The water when added with ice lasts for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: its great if it doesn't tip over
customer_reviews.text: love coleman. i joined a challenge which was advised to drink 1 gallon of water a day so i decided i had to buy something to help which this is great for. the negative part is that it leaks from the top. I wished it had a better seal.
customer_reviews.author: marcy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very poor lid sealing. No not tip over or it will leak.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: LEAKED
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, these leaked inside the limosine we rented for a girls night out party. Leaked out the side of the screw top lid, and they were not over-filled.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best Jug for Marching Band/Drum Corps!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third jug like this - and not because we have problems with them. We tried two other styles during his first year in Texas marching band (August, 100 degrees, 12-hour days), but most are only 1/2 gallon, and that's not enough water for the kind of workout the kids do - even when refilled at lunch and dinner break. This style holds enough water and DOESN'T LEAK. We still have one in the garage, as we had to match the color to the group he's in this year. Also, these are made in AMERICA, which many of the others aren't - huge plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Wood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and keeps it cold!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays lacrosse and would always seem to run out of water/Gatorade while playing or practicing. It’s pretty impossible to do that now that she has this! Just what we needed and it keeps the stuff cold for a long time :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kasch

customer_reviews.title: The price is excellent. It is very sturdy and doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to use while he works outside all day. It is big enough to last him throughout the day and it keeps the water cold. There is still ice in the jug at the end of the day (even on 95 degree days). The price is excellent. It is very sturdy and doesn't leak. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic is sturdy and handle is not too thin or weak
customer_reviews.text: Only removed one star as this item came by itself versus my order of ten blue jugs that came in one box. This item came alone while my nine other reds came packaged together. All in all, it arrived perfectly. We purchased these for our employees along with individual canisters of Gatorade due to the hot weather. In lieu of the large jug each person is responsible for the upkeep of their jugs; this provide them responsibility versus the company having to clean the jugs for the employees. They are less likely to let it be ruined or lost if it is their own. Plastic is sturdy and handle is not too thin or weak.
customer_reviews.author: DKThorn

customer_reviews.title: Quality Thermos
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for working outside or for sporting events. Reminds me of the heavy duty Coleman gear we took on Boy Scout camping trips. Very sturdy, awesome thermos. A+ quality!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L. Bigbee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy water bottle that takes a beating
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this product because we lost the first one at a soccer field. Sturdy water bottle that takes a beating! It is a large gallon jug, so make sure you are ordering the correct size. My 9-year old daughter uses this here in Phoenix and it always has more than enough water for her soccer games and it keeps the water cold and the ice cubes don't melt easily. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R. Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, good insulation.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my drinks cool and doesn't leak. Made in USA is a bonus. I make iced tea with boiling water right in the container. Cleans easily. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Badger

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your water cold
customer_reviews.text: Great jug, needed something to hold lots of water and durable and this is it! I'm not easy on this thing and it holds up great and keeps your water cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for an older version of the same thing. I'm not crazy about the spout - it's a bit hard to open and then seems flimsy once it is opened. It does serve its purpose of keeping contents cold in the summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Becky

customer_reviews.title: stay thirsty my friends
customer_reviews.text: This water cooler does keep my water cold through out the work day. Fairly rugged but I cannot forsee it handling strenuous wear and tear. The handle is also pretty flimsy and for those 2 reasons I gave 4 stars. Overall it's worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: William McGullam

customer_reviews.title: Handy dandy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Keeps water cold and allows 1/2 gallon of water at your disposal. Doesn’t leak as some say but you can’t turn it upside down either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jug for a good price
customer_reviews.text: We love this cooler! Originally bought this for my husband to take to work. It has taken a beating and is still holding up strong! Doesn't leak or anything. Husband changed jobs, so he doesn't take it to work anymore but still use it when we are going somewhere and don't want to purchase water. Would definitely purchase again or recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly4259

customer_reviews.title: good quality large capacity
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and large capacity, if filled with ice before adding liquid it will stay cold all day even when it is hot outside. This is good to take on the job or even for picnics since the spout is big enough to pour from although it does pour a bit slow. The red color makes it easy to spot if you lose track of it too.
customer_reviews.author: Diancatzdogz

customer_reviews.title: Handle is a little flimsy, but otherwise OK
customer_reviews.text: Good basic cooler jug that my son uses for band. It works great to keep his drink cold. Only reason I did not give it five stars is that the handle seems a little flemsy and I am hoping it lasts this year. The smaller Igloo cooler that we also use has a better handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The handle also easily pops off the jug
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it leaks from the bottom of the drinking nozzle if the nozzle isn't perfectly straight. The handle also easily pops off the jug. It's good for the money I suppose. If you want a really nice one look at the under armor one, which I also have. I bought this one because under armor does have a 1 gal one like I need.
customer_reviews.author: dylan miles

customer_reviews.title: At this price everyone should be at the gym with this!
customer_reviews.text: Uhhh... 1. It's awesome. 2. It's cheaper than that crappy gallon gear stuff that converts a flimsy milk jug into a sleeved water bottle. 3. It keeps my drink cold for hours!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. GriffinTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Cooler keeps beverages VERY COLD almost all day in sunny temps. Easy to fill. Leaks some if tipped beyond horizontal, but altogether a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gumbysgal

customer_reviews.title: Ice can't even make it 5 hours into my shift
customer_reviews.text: I put ice in this at 830 AM and it can't even make it past 1 without it being melted. I definitely expected more after reading the reviews
customer_reviews.author: Dominic David Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect water jug for summer sports leagues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for summer soccer league where temperatures can get above 100. I have had no leaking issues or condensation issues yet. The lid screws on tightly and the spout is perfect for pouring or drinking straight from it. I fill it up and am able to share it with others who run low and still have plenty leftover. I have no complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: SoonerMel

customer_reviews.title: Best ten bucks I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my water cold all day long even in the hot truck. I don't leave the windows down while I am working because I don't want construction dust to get inside. The cab of the truck get's hotter than hell but the water in this jug stays cold. Best ten bucks I ever spent...in America.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Took this baby out ice fishing! I put hot ...
customer_reviews.text: Took this baby out ice fishing! I put hot water in it at 7am water was still warm around 7pm. I was not worried about it freezing at all.
customer_reviews.author: A3FtCentipede

customer_reviews.title: (☞゚ヮ゚)☞
customer_reviews.text: We canoed down the Colorado River and used these for some of our in canoe drinking water. They held up great, but are a bit bulky for one gallon. We should've just taken the gallon jugs you can buy at the store, but these work well, for keeping cold drinks icy while at the park or a game.
customer_reviews.author: Stefen von Horten II

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.text: My husband works in a mechanic shop and drinks water all day. This is the first thermos he has had that doesn't leak when he drinks from it. I wish it kept things colder for longer, but we solved that problem by putting a frozen water bottle inside.
customer_reviews.author: baabaa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We use these for tennis and they are perfect for having a lot of cold water handy especially when it's really hot or humid. Well made-- no leaks or issues.
customer_reviews.author: smeli18

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wash but it leaks in two different areas.
customer_reviews.author: dragon izumi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Leaks!!!!! You can not pour anything with out it making a mess. Made in the usa but poor quality! Going to have to look for another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: AG Family

customer_reviews.title: It's a useful size that is still manageable and stays cold for ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it for gymnastics and drinks a lot of water. It's a useful size that is still manageable and stays cold for over 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A Wasielewski

customer_reviews.title: I dont know if mine is bad or it is just designed like that
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is alright...it will keep water with a lot of ice, cold for hours. It does leak if it is tipped on its side. I dont know if mine is bad or it is just designed like that. Either way, it does a good job at keeping things cold.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Holds ice all day.
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday for work. Dropped more then once on a cement floor, and still not a dent on it. Holds ice all day, even in 90 degree heat. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Keeps water cold for hours. Use it for baseball season and we had plenty of water for me and my son. Great cooler and easy to drink from the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Bob z

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if that's common problem with coolers like this, but it's occasionally annoying
customer_reviews.text: Only downside to this is ice seems to block the flow of liquid when drinking out if it. Not sure if that's common problem with coolers like this, but it's occasionally annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Best in class
customer_reviews.text: I got these because we spend long days working outside in the summer. We used to always end up with countless water bottles rolling around in the truck and they were always hot. Now, we fill two of these with ice and water and have plenty of cold drinking water for two men and dogs. I've had a couple before that were not as well made. The Igloo brand ones I had leaked and the insulating walls are noticeably thinner.
customer_reviews.author: MyRealReview

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have both the blue and red. Very durable. Had been thrown from forklift more than i can count. No damage, no leaks, holds liquid cold for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler but too big for work
customer_reviews.text: Nice cooler, sturdy design. I bought this 1 gallon for work for $10.00 but the size was too big to fit behind the truck seat. I wanted to send it back but it but they wanted $8.00 to send it back, so I kept it. The same brand 1/2 gallon I replaced it with is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: crunchman

customer_reviews.title: Great for Marching Band!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and just want we needed for my daughters marching band. As everyone has to have the same jug. This has a flat top which is great for sitting on when allowed breaks during marching practice. Has held up the entire marching season and we plan to use it again this upcoming marching season as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy123

customer_reviews.title: ... the top if you're not careful but I do love the size and simplicity
customer_reviews.text: The top isn't as insulated as it could be and the spout does render it a little leaky in the top if you're not careful but I do love the size and simplicity. I think it'll be easy to keep clean and I don't have to worry about some spout at the bottom getting leaky or bumped open.
customer_reviews.author: jamie lisa

customer_reviews.title: These are GIANT
customer_reviews.text: Watch Size on this. They are GIANT! Wasn’t expecting to be so large. Too big for kids.
customer_reviews.author: KYgirl5

customer_reviews.title: Great beverage cooler
customer_reviews.text: The short and sweet of it is holds a gallon of water and I have found that it keeps ice for nearly two days in 90 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great jug
customer_reviews.text: Holds a gallon of water, insulates well, doesn't leak. I bring this to derby practice 3-4x a week so it gets some heavy use. I did have another one prior that I dropped right into the spout and the plastic cracked. However the product is high enough quality that I just replaced it with another one. Barring freak accidents this should last you as long as you want it.
customer_reviews.author: GamesBookstore

customer_reviews.title: Few complaints, but very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. Very tough to break. Will hold ice for 18+ hours. My only complaint is that the threads left plastic shavings in my drink for the first few weeks that I used it, so I had to completely finish drinking it or just pour out the remainder to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: It has a big lid which makes it easy to open and clean, and it has a small spout for pouring without making a mess. Best of all, it doesn't leak. In this day and age when everything is made as cheap and poor quality as possible, Coleman is still making a jug worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is in her 2nd year of rough housing ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in her 2nd year of rough housing this item through her active summer life and it still does exactly what it’s supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: TJbeek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter to use for after school sports. We wipe the edge of the cooler before we put the lid on and haven't noticed it leaking as others have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: It just works.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to keep ice and water for post bike ride or run. Keeps ice frozen even in South Louisiana summer heat!
customer_reviews.author: Jess L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean, Stays Cold, and Hard to Break
customer_reviews.text: This is great! My kids is a cross country runner and needs to stay hydrated. This has helped. We can fill this with ice there night before and it's still mostly ice there next morning. This jug is also durable enough to stand up to a teenage boy and yet ready enough for said teenage to clean.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Coleman water jug
customer_reviews.text: Searched high and low for a nice water jug and this is the one. Our daughter works in the park system and I was worried about her getting over heated. The only thing is she has to take an extra cup to drink or she's wears water for a while after each drink.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: NO LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have been reading the reviews about leaking, but the one I received is perfect. Keeps ice for a very long time and easy to carry handle.
customer_reviews.author: DGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Very big, not great insulation, but awesome value
customer_reviews.text: Fair warning, this bottle is hilariously enormous and is hard to drink from directly, but it makes a great refill container for a smaller water bottle. My only issue is that it does not insulate tremendously well and that my water doesn't stay cold after a couple hours. Good value for the size though!
customer_reviews.author: Tori S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s red though
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like red but nice for hubby to take water to work
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Phalanges

customer_reviews.title: Don't over tighten the lid.
customer_reviews.text: At first I over-tightened it, and then it leaked. I backed the lid off a little, and there is no leak at all. Don't over tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Christine H.

customer_reviews.title: As a gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooler as a gift for my son's baseball coach and personalized it with his name and filled it with sunflower seeds and snacks. I hope he enjoys it
customer_reviews.author: BayouDoll

customer_reviews.title: My son is happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: My Son uses this at his landscaping job. When it's 90F you need your ice water to stay cold. He loves it. He had an Igloo brand jug that we had to take back because it leaked and didn't stay cold. Bottom line, this little reliable Coleman lives up to its reputation!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaMarie White

customer_reviews.title: Great water jug
customer_reviews.text: Great water jug, the only issue I have is the spout can sometimes leak a bit to the side especially if you don't open it all the way. Other than that it works great to put ice and water in it so you can have ice cold water all day.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: All of the fancy double walled stainless steel mucho dinero bottles out there: take notice that this good old basic water jug gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this jug on a daily basis at work. It's very durable and works great. If I fill it with ice and water, a lot of the ice still hasn't melted the next day at work (24 hours later). It has come in very handy!
customer_reviews.author: DreamCrusher

customer_reviews.title: Good insulation and the lid seals tight.
customer_reviews.text: Nice insulated jug. I use this jug daily at work in temperatures of 80 - 95 degrees and at the end of the day it still has ice in it. I thought it was a great deal. I don't understand why the blue jug was twice the price as the red jug at the time of sale, but, whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It was inexpensive, and it keeps cold liquids cold if you add ice. Liquid often leaks around the lid, so I'm constantly tightening up the lid to keep leaks from happening. It was cheap, so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: J Ayers

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: good to have for an extended vacation drive in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Conan the Barbarian

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I try to drink at least a gallon of water every day so I bought us each one of these to help us measure and track our progress. Unfortunately there isn't a rubber seal in the lid so it leaks water when we pour it out or if it is on its side (like in the fridge or car) no matter how tight we close the lid on. So I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it cold
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. My son uses it every day for band camp to keep water cold. It generally sits outside in the near tripe digit temps, here in south TX and it is there all day. I'm amazed that it still has ice when he comes home in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Troy R. Bayham

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion coleman makes some of the most rugged outdoor equipment. I have had every other jug made by other name brand places and ALL of them leaked or the tops didn't fit tight. Being in construction all my stuff gets abused. My coleman jug handles it all from being thrown in the back of the work truck to being used as a job site lunch seat. Awesome product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BMXER

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water cold for hours!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my sons' football practices. Keeps the water and ice cold for hours! We left one in the car overnight (hot Phoenix summer) and 18 hours later there was still ice in it! So glad I bough these!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanee Gambino

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it cold!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband who works outside. He fills it with ice and water at 5am and when he walks in the door at 4pm you can still hear the ice moving around inside---even after being outside in 100 degree heat all day!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Keeps water cold all day in Florida heat. Do not put in the dishwasher!!
customer_reviews.author: Tor

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Used for pregnancy. I stay thirsty and need cold drinks all day and this serves its purpose. Fill it up with ice and it last for hours.
customer_reviews.author: wagn-sha

customer_reviews.title: Little League Games
customer_reviews.text: We take this with us when we go to my son's Little League games and it is a life saver on hot days. When usually have 4-5 people in our group, and this will last the entire game.
customer_reviews.author: HappyDad

customer_reviews.title: Classics never die
customer_reviews.text: My husband works out of his truck all day and drinks a ton of water. Instead of multiple water bottles, we were looking for something that we could throw in chunks of ice and last all day. We knew we wanted what we used to drink out of as kids, and we found it on amazon. PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great idea but it definitely leaks! If you try to use it for anything other than water you might find yourself stained.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: ... the spout right at the handle hinge which is pretty annoying if you're trying to drink directly from it ...
customer_reviews.text: The way the lid screws on for mine always ends up placing the spout right at the handle hinge which is pretty annoying if you're trying to drink directly from it or pour from it. After you finagle a way to dispense from it, it's a pretty good little cooler.
customer_reviews.author: DCLYNDS

customer_reviews.title: )) is quite satisfied with this cooler container
customer_reviews.text: My other half (my wife :)) is quite satisfied with this cooler container. She's rather satisfied and delighted as she works in the garden in the hot weather she enjoy the cold water both for drinking and refreshing herself too...we made the switch to the Coleman brand as Rubbermaid never held ice this lengthy. arrived quickly, shipment was excellent. If my review is helpful to you, let other buyers know by clicking the "yes" button below indicating so. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions about this product, I will try to help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I work in a warehouse and this is very durable! It keeps water cool for a long time even if the ice melts. Doesn't leak if closed properly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get the plastic taste out of this cooler to save my life. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from the top if it falls over
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should if standing upright. But during car transport, make sure it is secure so it doesn't tip over and spill. Also when pouring, you also need to make sure the spout is opened completely to avoid spilling as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like a sieve...
customer_reviews.text: Leaks like a sieve at the mouthpiece. I held out for this one over some cheap numbers they were selling at the local big box hardware store, thinking this one was the real deal. Didn't quite pan out...and who's gonna mail a jug back?
customer_reviews.author: Napun_Gnome

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak, keeps cold
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the Igloo models, this thing is just amazing. I had to get used to being able to put it on its side and not just assume that it'd leak (it doesn't). Drinking from it is also a no-drip process. Keeps liquid cold, and is super cheap. Also no chemical odor to the water unlike the Igloo, even if left for several days.
customer_reviews.author: levl289

customer_reviews.title: This jug is great. I work outside all day and drink a ...
customer_reviews.text: This jug is great. I work outside all day and drink a lot of water. Every morning i put a tray of ice cubes in and fill with water. The water stays cool all day
customer_reviews.author: Zach Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler - Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler, doesn't need much ice to keep water cold all day. I seem to have trouble with leaking coolers, but this one (so far) doesn't leak a drop.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bowman

customer_reviews.title: FYI
customer_reviews.text: I love this jug. It's great for all sporting events, even for work. My boyfriend works in a warehouse & doesn't get to many chances to run & get some water. It's really sturdy & perfect for the summer. Great for Gatorade.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Jug, use dish soap to wash off the strong plastic odor
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Got it in red. It's pretty sturdy as well. When it arrived it was overly dusty inside which was weird and a slightly strong plastic smell. Washed it with Dawn dish soap a couple times and everything was ok afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: KatyfromMD

customer_reviews.title: Water Jug
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using these water jugs for his construction job for over 30 years. This is the 3rd or 4th jug I have purchased. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: grammysbus

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just love it and so comfy. Great offer of $8.00
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Magaña Guizar

customer_reviews.title: cap feels a little loose
customer_reviews.text: i guess it's ok, i need a jug for work
customer_reviews.author: Gemyni Turner

customer_reviews.title: So I think this is working just fine for keeping him hydrated
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a present for Fathers Day. He loves it! I always tell him to drink more water. He's on the go so much in his truck for work that he keeps this in the truck and just drinks. So I think this is working just fine for keeping him hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: KWalk

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Okay, first off, so you know, this thing is HUGE. it's great if you're going to need to drink out of it for a week, but for a young kid for one game, you need to fill it half way full because 1. they never drink it all and 2. it's freaking heavy for them and you'll be carrying it :) overall, good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works great, holds a ton of water
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for last years football jug which my son left on a field somewhere. Works great, holds a ton of water, doesn't leak. Easily washable.
customer_reviews.author: CarlottaB

product_meta.title: Coleman 1-Gallon Beverage Cooler
product_meta.description: Keep them cool and hydrated on warm days with the Coleman 1-Gallon Beverage Cooler. Ideal for camping, cookouts, and sporting events, this compact beverage dispenser holds up to 1 gallon of ice water or other beverages. The wide-mouth top enables spill-free filling and the flip spout lets kids and adults easily grab a quick drink. A convenient bail handle lets you carry the water cooler with one hand, and the secure screw-top lid prevents leaks. This outdoor drink cooler is made in the USA with low CO2 insulation for reduced carbon emissions from foam manufacturing.
feature_bullets: Beverage cooler holds up to 1 gallon of ice water or other beverages
Wide-mouth top for fast, easy filling
Bail handle for convenient one-handed carrying
ThermOZONE Insulation doesn’t contain CFCs, HFCs or HCFCs, which deplete the ozone
Wide-mouth top and twist-on cap for easy filling
Flip-top spout for a quick drink
Stain- and odor-resistant liner helps prevent lingering smells
Durable design resists dents, scratches and fading
Large bail handle makes carrying easier
